text:
@SpeakerPelosi @WhipClyburn No one needs a ‘coronavirus committee’, Nan. What Americans NEED is for you to get back to work, supporting President @realDonaldTrump in fixing our country.
STOP all congressional salaries until Americans are back to work. WE cannot afford your sloth &wastefulness.
